format: A data frame with 3435 observations on the following 6 variables.
reference: These data are an example of cross-classified grouping factors.
description:
Description
Scores attained by 3435 Scottish secondary school students on a
standardized test taken at age 16.  Both the primary school and the
secondary school that the student attended have been recorded.
title: Scottish secondary school scores

parameters.sex: A factor with levels M and F
parameters.primary:
A factor indicating the primary school that the
student attended.
parameters.social:
The student's social class on a numeric scale from low
to high social class.
parameters.attain:
The score attained on the standardized test taken at
age 16.
parameters.second:
A factor indicating the secondary school that the
student attended.
parameters.verbal:
The verbal reasoning score on a test taken by the
students on entry to secondary school.
